title: New dad Dom Lever proudly shows off Jess Shears breastfeeding their newborn baby
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Love Island 's Dom Lever broadcast Jess Shears breastfeeding their infant on Instagram.

The new dad was bursting with pride as he took to social media to show how his love was settling into her new mothering role on Thursday.

In sweet scenes, Jess gave Dom a thumbs up when he panned the camera towards her while she was breastfeeding their baby.

The Love Island couple had to stop at a petrol station so the new mum could feed their baby.

Dom normalised breastfeeding when he lovingly filmed Jess doting on their newborn baby.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

In a piece to camera, the Love Island hunk celebrated their new role as parents.

The reality star said: "There is nothing more real than stopping at a services to breastfeed."

Dom and Jess are yet to reveal the name of their newborn child.

It's an exciting time for Jess and Dom as they have become parents for the first time.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

(Image: Instagram)

The couple were delighted to give their 1.3million fans just a glimmer into their new lives as parents to their newborn.

In one of the snaps, the smitten lovebirds put on a very cosy display as Jess wrapped her arms around Dom's neck.

Also, Jess showed off her incredibly flat post-baby stomach while she posed in a crop top for a social media video.

The new mum has already hit out at vile baby trolls after she become a mother for the first time.

The happy pair fell for each other when they first crossed paths on the 2017 series of Love Island.

Despite bowing out of the series early, the couple's love for each other has blossomed off camera.
description: The Love Island couple had to stop at a petrol station so the new mum could feed their baby
